s.label: Use double precision
s.description: Determines whether double precision arithmetic is used.

s.label: Keep log file
s.description: Determines whether a log file of the run will be kept on disk. Note that even if this option is set to false, log files will be stored in any OSKAR binary data files produced by the simulator.
